channel.title: Validating Steam Files Error
channel.description: I have been playing Black Mesa for a few days now, and now every time I try to start it up, it says it is "Validating Steam Files" It then says Validation 100% complete, but gives me an error message on top of that which says, "The Steam servers are currently too busy to handle your request please try again later." I have looked all over, and there doesn't seem to be any fix for this. Am I just out of luck and have to reinstall the whole thing?

AldurDisciple:

Same problem here, I am running on Windows 7, Half Life 2 is launching properly, but for some reason Black Mesa won’t launch due to Steam servers being too busy to validate my files …

I found that reinstalling Black Mesa fixes the file validation problem, but this is quite annoying as the problem shows up each time I restart my computer :’(

Did anyone found a solution to this ?

Reinstall did NOT fix the problem for me :’(
